thread.title: Universal releases fake 'Jaws 19' trailer
thread.title_full: Universal releases fake 'Jaws 19' trailer - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Universal releases fake 'Jaws 19' trailer
text:
Universal Pictures Home Entertainment/Via YouTube "Jaws 19" may never make it to theaters, but "Back to the Future" diehards can at least enjoy the trailer. You guys aren't ready for it yet. But your kids are gonna love it.
In honor of the 30th anniversary of the original "Back to the Future," and it being the year portrayed in "Back to the Future II," we've seen several tributes to Robert Zemeckis' trilogy about the time-traveling adventures of Marty and Doc Brown.
universal Michael J. Fox and Christopher Lloyd in "Back to the Future." Even the studios are getting in on the fun, as Universal - the studio that produced back to the future - released an "official" trailer for "Jaws 19," a fictional sequel hyped as existing in "Back to the Future II's" universe in 2015.
Universal - which also produced the "Jaws" franchise - gives us a trailer that fills us in on what happened between the final real "Jaws" film - "Jaws: The Revenge," the fourth film in the franchise - and 2015's "Jaws 19."
The trailer has already amassed nearly 300,000 hits on YouTube since it came out on Monday.
slepore@nydailynews.com
